body: Journalist Aguirre Peixoto's dismissal from the Brazilian newspaper A Tarde caused outrage among bloggers and journalists [pt]: Peixoto's reports on the environmental damage caused by a new development to the city of Salvador allegedly put an end to the contractors' advertising in the broadsheet. After applying 30-days suspension on Peixoto, the newspaper will readmit him.

After applying 30-days suspension on Peixoto, the newspaper will readmit him.
title: Brazil: Journalist's dismissal causes outrage

sentence: Journalist Aguirre Peixoto's dismissal from the Brazilian newspaper A Tarde caused outrage among bloggers and journalists [pt]: Peixoto's reports on the environmental damage caused by a new development to the city of Salvador allegedly put an end to the contractors' advertising in the broadsheet.
